projectMetadata.name: Compliance Platform Landing Pages
notes: This PRD is intentionally separate from the main product PRD.json.
Goal: ship two static landing pages + waitlist capture + calendar link.
Implementation: Astro static site deployed to Netlify.
Keep this lean. No Shopify API. No backend. No database.

progressTracking.rule: After completing each feature, update PRD.landing.json and append a dated entry to progress.landing.txt.

engineering: All routes load directly by URL

features.title: Initialize Astro landing project
features.goal: Create minimal Astro static site ready for Netlify deployment.
tasks: Create new landing repo or ./landing directory
Add README with dev + deploy instructions
verification: npm run dev starts Astro dev server
npm run build outputs ./dist
README contains clear setup steps

features.title: Create site routes
features.goal: Add required pages and shared layout.
verification: All routes render correctly locally
Layout consistent across pages

features.title: EU merchant landing copy
features.goal: Conversion-focused messaging for small EU Shopify merchants.
tasks: Hero section with clear problem + CTA
verification: Value proposition clear within 10 seconds
Primary CTA visible above the fold

features.title: Mid-market landing copy
verification: Page invites a sales conversation
No overpromising of regulatory automation

features.title: Implement Netlify Forms
verification: Forms detected by Netlify after deploy
Test submission appears in Netlify dashboard
Redirect to /thanks works

features.title: Calendar integration
features.goal: Ensure calendar link visible and consistent.
tasks: Add calendar CTA above the fold on both landing pages
verification: All calendar links use configured URL
At least one booking CTA visible without scrolling

features.title: Responsive layout
features.goal: Mobile-first clean layout optimized for conversion.
verification: Layout works at 375px and 1280px
Buttons easy to tap on mobile

features.title: SEO and metadata
features.goal: Add basic SEO and social sharing metadata.
verification: Meta tags present in page source
Each page has unique metadata

features.title: Privacy baseline
tasks: Add Privacy Policy link in footer
Add short data usage note near forms
verification: Privacy link visible on all pages
Form includes clear data usage notice

features.title: Netlify deployment configuration
tasks: Add netlify.toml with build command and publish directory
Ensure all routes load directly by URL
verification: Netlify build succeeds
Direct URL access works for all routes

features.title: Lean quality checks
tasks: Ensure clean build on fresh install
Optional: add simple Playwright smoke test for route loading
verification: npm run build succeeds in clean environment
No broken links detected

features.title: Post-launch checklist
features.goal: Ensure lead capture works after deploy.
verification: Test lead visible in Netlify dashboard
Calendar opens correctly

features.title: Minimal CI build check (GitHub Actions)
features.goal: Prevent broken builds from being deployed to Netlify.
tasks: Configure workflow to run on pull_request and push to main
Steps: npm ci, npm run build
Optional: add astro check or lint step
verification: Workflow runs automatically on PR
Build fails if npm run build fails
No coverage requirements or complex pipeline logic

features.title: Dependabot (weekly, grouped, low-noise)
features.goal: Keep dependencies reasonably up to date without creating churn.
tasks: Group dependency updates into a single PR
verification: Dependabot opens at most one grouped PR per week
No daily spam PRs
Can be disabled easily if noisy
